quests.name: Running Like Clockwork
objectives:
Gather the following materials:
  ‧ 25 Hardwood.
  ‧ 10 Green Passion Lily.
Craft the 6 Harmonious Screen.
Arrange the 6 Harmonious Screens around Vanellope's House.
Talk to Cogsworth.
Remove the Harmonious Screens from around Vanellope's House.
Talk to Vanellope.
Talk to Cogsworth.
Talk to Moana.
Search Dazzle Beach's sand and water to find 6 Broken Pieces of a Tropical Lifeguard Chair.
Craft Tropical Lifeguard Chair.
Place Tropical Lifeguard Chair anywhere on Dazzle Beach.
Talk to Moana.
Talk to Cogsworth, if you can.
Talk to Stitch.

Catch Cogsworth's Gears. (They're flying around the Valley.)
  ‧ Forest of Valor.
  ‧ Dazzle Beach.
  ‧ Plaza.
Make sure you have Cogsworth's Gears in your Inventory.
Bring Cogsworth's Gears to Cogsworth.

quests.name: On Her Majesty's Festive Service
objectives: Talk to Anna.

Place the Winter Carnival Banner in the following Biomes:
  ‧ Near Scrooge McDuck's Store.
  ‧ The Glade of Trust.
  ‧ Dazzle Beach.
  ‧ The Sunlit Plateau.

Gather materials for the icy furniture:
  ‧ 125 Snowball.
  ‧ 10 Dry Wood.
  ‧ 10 Crystal.

Craft a:
  ‧ Icy Armchair.
  ‧ Snow Hut.

Decorate the Frosted Heights to prepare for the Winter Carnival.
  ‧ Icy Armchair.
  ‧ Snow Hut.
Talk to Cogsworth.
Check on Olaf inside Chez Remy.
Talk to Olaf.
Serve 3 clients in Chez Remy.
Talk to Cogsworth.

Prepare for the Winter Carnival.
  ‧ Place the Frozen Hot Cocoa Counter in the Frosted Heights to start the carnival.
Enjoy the Winter Carnival.
Talk to Anna.
Talk to Cogsworth.

quests.name: The Circle of Friendship
objectives: Visit Timon and Pumbaa at Pride Rock.
Talk to Cogsworth.

Gather some Clay for Lumiere.
  ‧ 5 Clay.
Bring Clay to Lumiere.
Gather 5 Mushrooms for Cogsworth.
Bring Mushrooms to Cogsworth.
Visit the Beast's Castle.
Talk to Cogsworth.

Gather the materials to make the Red Rose Vase and the Leafy Hammock:
  ‧ 15 Clay.
  ‧ 6 Red Rose.
  ‧ 5 Gold Ingot.
  ‧ 8 Blue Falling Penstemon.
  ‧ 5 Pink Bromeliad.
  ‧ 5 Red Bromeliad.
  ‧ 8 Jungle Bamboo from The Lion King Realm.

Craft furniture for Cogsworth and Lumiere's competition:
  ‧ 1 Red Rose Vase.
  ‧ 1 Leafy Hammock.
Check up on Cogsworth in the Beast's Castle.

WHAT IS GOING ON HERE?
  ‧ Catch the 3 bugs in the Beast's Castle.
Make sure you have Red Rose Vase in your Inventory.
Bring the Red Rose Vase to Cogsworth.
Check up on Lumiere at Pride Rock.

This is NOT fine.
  ‧ Put out the 8 fires at Pride Rock.
Bring the Leafy Hammock to Lumiere.
Eavesdrop on Lumiere and Cogsworth.
Talk to Cogsworth.

Gather Ingredients for Cogsworth:
  ‧ 2 Wheat.
  ‧ 2 Egg.
  ‧ 2 Milk.
  ‧ 2 Sugarcane.
Bring the Ingredients to Cogsworth.
Put on 3 Elegant clothing.
Go into the Beast's Castle.
Talk to Cogsworth.

quests.name: Vote for Cogsworth!
objectives:
Gather materials for the Election Signs and a Ballot Box.
  ‧ 25 Softwood.
  ‧ 20 Hardwood.
  ‧ 3 Black Passion Lily.
  ‧ 10 Purple Impatiens.
  ‧ 3 Gold Ingot.

Craft the following items:
  ‧ 5 Election Sign.
  ‧ 1 Ballot Box.
Place the 3 Election Signs in the Valley.

Make sure you have the Ballot Box in your Inventory.
  ‧ Ballot Box.
Bring the Ballot Box to Cogsworth.
Talk to Villagers who might be interested in the electoral campaign.

Talk to:
  ‧ Scar.
  ‧ Jasmine.
  ‧ Buzz Lightyear.
Return to Cogsworth.

Help the Villagers with their election campaigns.
  ‧ Cogsworth's Campaign
  ‧ Jasmine's Campaign
  ‧ Scar's Campaign
Check in with Cogsworth.
Enter the Dreamlight Castle to begin the campaign speeches.
Talk to Cogsworth to begin the campaign speeches.
Place the celebration table anywhere in the Valley.
Celebrate the election of the new Dreamlight Valley mayor.

Talk to everyone who participated in the election:
  ‧ Cogsworth.
  ‧ Scar.
  ‧ Jasmine.
Return to Cogsworth.

quests.name: Cogsworth's Campaign: No Substitute for Hard Work
objectives: Talk to Cogsworth.
Begin a hangout with Cogsworth.
Complete 5 Dreamlight Duties while hanging out with Cogsworth.
Talk to Cogsworth.

Talk to other Villagers to help Cogsworth's campaign.
  ‧ Belle.
  ‧ Merlin.
  ‧ Mushu.
Talk to Cogsworth.
